remarks: A strict order relation is a transitive relation.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
soiOLD.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
soiOLD.2 $e |- R Or S $.
soiOLD.3 $e |- R C_ ( S X. S ) $.
sotriOLD.4 $e |- B e. _V $.
sotriOLD.5 $e |- C e. _V $.
sotriOLD $p |- ( ( A R B /\ B R C ) -> A R C ) $.
